name: ‧Sudoku‧
description:
A Classic Sudoku game for beginners and advanced players. Train your brain with a well-designed sudoku game on your iPhone and iPad in a pleasant time.

Daily Challenge mode is to give you a fresh and challenging puzzle every day. Once completed all challenges, you will win 12 trophies and get jealous of others as a “Sudoku Master hand”!


Highlights:

Thousands of Sudoku puzzles
Multiple difficulty settings: from Easy to Master
Unique solution for each puzzle
Trophies collection of every month

Auto-Check to see the mistakes as you go
Auto-Solve to help you with hard levels
Unlimited Undo and Redo
Mark conflicts in a unique box
Timer function

User-friendly and minimalist design
Easy to use pencilmarks keyboard
Big buttons avoid fat-fingering


Tons of puzzles are waiting for you! Download Sudoku now and play with it anytime and anywhere! :)
